definitions.definition: Currency unit (hundredth of a peso ) in Mexico .

A similar subdenomination of various other currencies (in Argentina , Bolivia , Brazil , Cape Verde , Colombia , Cuba , Dominican Republic , East Timor , Ecuador , Guatemala , Honduras , Mozambique , Nicaragua , and the Philippines ).

The former subdenomination of some other currencies (in Brazil , Chile , Costa Rica , Ecuador , El Salvador , Guinea-Bissau , Mozambique , Portugal , Puerto Rico , São Tomé and Príncipe , and Venezuela ).

main_definition: Currency unit (hundredth of a peso ) in Mexico .
secondary_definitions: A similar subdenomination of various other currencies (in Argentina , Bolivia , Brazil , Cape Verde , Colombia , Cuba , Dominican Republic , East Timor , Ecuador , Guatemala , Honduras , Mozambique , Nicaragua , and the Philippines ).

( historical ) The former subdenomination of some other currencies (in Brazil , Chile , Costa Rica , Ecuador , El Salvador , Guinea-Bissau , Mozambique , Portugal , Puerto Rico , São Tomé and Príncipe , and Venezuela ).
